body:
I did use the Honeybee_Update Honeybee,to update my components :
[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Vl9kv5g9jpJ9KsEbNFI3Iyn7u-tRwVWc8b4BkXc37OI3IRC1XHX5l2HMryA8siJ3ApaPd3XALCdOJD8yY6HITCVOKSjNsQk7/updatehb.jpg)

but I still get the same warning,only with the window material, both with new material and the material from library.

[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Vl9kv5g9jpKwP97J1ZrryMMcnF4U-EMrPu4ExhtejQ0ttLNcOQfMDwwCPDJKjj-jmPJhlWOUJeB36WhdJLLsBBFaM5Twiamr/win.jpg)I don't know what am I missing.

I checked the following discussions,although informative, but not with similar issue:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/ep-custom-materials?group...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/ep-custom-materials?groupUrl=ladybug&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987&id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1153201&page=2#comments)

Thank you for your time and patience. 
attached is GH file just in case.
